name: Thistle
response: Thistle is a peculiar troll with a penchant for progress and patchouli-scented winds. This eco-warrior of the trolls would rather sway in the breeze atop a dancing wind turbine than smash rocks into a pile of earth. In Thistle’s eyes, insurance isn’t just a safety net—it’s a grubby friend worth sharing its last maggot with (if said maggot has a good warranty). But Pharma? Oh, Pharma is a different story. If Pharma had a kingdom, Thistle would lay siege to it armed with nothing but a bag of rotten turnips and a heart full of vengeance. Crypto, on the other hand, is where Thistle’s respect shines through— if crypto were a person, Thistle might share its last grub with it, but only because crypto doesn’t smell as bad as Pharma does.
